name: aws

alias.title: Credential Alias
alias.description: Friendly identifier for this AWS integration.

roleArn.title: IAM Role ARN
roleArn.description: Cross-account role Openlane should assume in the tenant environment.

externalId.title: External ID
externalId.description: External ID required in the tenant role trust policy to prevent confused deputy attacks.

homeRegion.title: Security Hub Home Region
homeRegion.description: Primary AWS region where Security Hub aggregation is managed.

region.title: AWS Region (Legacy)
region.description: Legacy alias for home region; use Security Hub Home Region when possible.

linkedRegions.title: Linked Regions
linkedRegions.description: Optional list of regions to filter findings by region.

organizationId.title: AWS Organization ID
organizationId.description: Optional AWS Organizations identifier (for traceability and scoping).

accountScope.title: Account Scope
accountScope.description: Use all accessible accounts from the delegated admin role, or limit to specific account IDs.

accountIds.title: Account IDs
accountIds.description: Required when Account Scope is set to specific.

sessionDuration.title: Session Duration
sessionDuration.description: Optional session duration (Go duration string, e.g. 1h30m).

sessionName.title: Session Name
sessionName.description: Optional session name override for STS AssumeRole calls.

accessKeyId.title: Access Key ID
accessKeyId.description: Optional source credential key when Openlane cannot use runtime IAM credentials.

secretAccessKey.title: Secret Access Key
secretAccessKey.description: Optional source credential secret paired with Access Key ID.

sessionToken.title: Session Token
sessionToken.description: Optional source session token when using temporary source credentials.

accountId.title: Account ID
accountId.description: Optional AWS account identifier for reference.

tags.title: Default Tags
tags.description: Optional key/value map added to generated integrations for traceability.

description: Collect AWS security and compliance findings and posture from Security Hub and Audit Manager data.
